source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 387 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,093 to 5,003 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,003 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
